function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of a closed Facebook group for educational purposes","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation or inappropriate content","Mitigation":"Moderation and oversight of group content and discussions","Technologies":"Content filtering and group moderation tools","People":"Residents and trainees","Owner":"Educational program coordinators"},{"Description":"Implementing flipped classroom technique for conferences","Impact":"Risk of decreased engagement and interactivity during conference sessions","Mitigation":"Design specific activities to encourage engagement and interaction, such as group discussions and case-based learning","Technologies":"Video conferencing and collaboration platforms","People":"Conference participants and organizers","Owner":"Conference organizers"},{"Description":"Institution of separate tracks for junior and senior residents","Impact":"Potential increase in administrative workload and management complexity","Mitigation":"Careful planning and organization of resources for separate tracks, including scheduling and content development","Technologies":"Learning management systems and scheduling software","People":"Junior and senior residents, program coordinators","Owner":"Program coordinators"}]}
